gold.user: Retrieve the details of a specific group in Jira.
gold.ideal: Returns the group information including its name, description, and members.

gold.user: Create a new group in Jira with the specified name.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates the group and returns its details.

gold.user: Delete an existing group from Jira by its ID.
gold.ideal: Confirms the group has been removed successfully.

gold.user: Fetch details of multiple groups in a single request.
gold.ideal: Returns an array of group details.

gold.user: List all users that belong to a specific group.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of user details associated with the group.

gold.user: Add a user to a specified group in Jira.
gold.ideal: Confirms the user has been added to the group successfully.

gold.user: Remove a user from a specific group in Jira.
gold.ideal: Confirms the user has been removed from the group successfully.

gold.user: Search for groups based on a query string.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of groups that match the search criteria.
